reviewerName: Dennis Troy "AND NOW MR. DeMILLE, I'M READY F...
reviewText: If Pattie LaBelle came on stage and just stood there for an hour I would give her a standing ovation just for being who she is. A singer who sang the songs SHE wanted to sing. An Artist who sang the songs the way SHE wanted to sing them. Any DVD or CD that has anything on it that has to do with Patti is worth having in your collection. This FABULOUS DVD is no exception....Patti.. the ULTIMATE DIVA!!  Love..Dennis Troy
summary: OH PATTI.....WHAT CAN I SAY ABOUT PATTI?

reviewText: These are among some of the most entertaining videos that I've seen.  All proving that Ms. LaBelle deserves to be called a superstar.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Lovely Vanessa Williams, but how can you release a "Best of" video collection for this sultry performer without "The Colors of the Wind", "Darlin' I", "Your are my Home", "The Comfort Zone" and "Just for Tonight"? Very limited "Best of" collection, not well put together.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Classic Videos out on DVD, finally. 20th Century Masters releases only 6 videos. Great picture and sound. Patti Labelle looks great & classy in all those clips, I know they seem a bit dated... you know with all the 80's hairdos & outfits. You gotta check out her shoe tossing techniques in "If You Asked Me To". "Oh People" remains a very inspiring song and "On My Own" is even more touching by looking at both singers onscreen...
Title: N/A
